===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ようかい}} compound {{m|zh|妖怪|tr=ʔjew kwɛj<sup>H</sup>|lit=strange, supernatural + extraordinary}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''yāoguài''.

===Pronunciation===

===Adjective===

# {{lb|ja|dated|sort=ようかい}} [[creepy]], [[spooky]], [[ghastly]], [[perilous]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''妖怪'''な雰囲気|'''ようかい''' な ふんいき|a '''creepy''' atmosphere / a '''spooky''' mood}}

Note that the Japanese concept of the ''yōkai'' does not map directly to any specific English term.
